job_title: Institutional Advancement Assistant in Manitowoc, WI
pros: Great team environment. Loved the work I did
cons: College permanently closed and I lost my job

pros: Some of the students were earnest
cons: The place was completely mismanaged. Top administrators bled the place dry and then shuttered it.

review_title: Appealing employer from the outside looking in...
pros: The Franciscan sisters love the college and are trying to do whatever it takes to keep the college going.  Their mission is incredible and are literally changing lives of the students who attend SLC.
cons: The definition of insanity is alive and well.   The college is facing challenging times and leadership is like a rotating door where every 2 years or so someone is let go, replaced, given a few years to change things around but the result itself never changes.  The pay is below market with no annual adjustments, and  incredibly poor benefits.  No one works together and is willing to do whatever it takes to throw people under the 'bus' to make themselves look good and get ahead.  Employee morale is at an all time low.

job_title: Anonymous Employee in Clinton Township, MI
pros: Good work experience and prepared you for real life work.
cons: Being in a bad environment brought stress
